detail_desc: Top in glittery tulle with short, wide puff sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Jersey lining.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a unique nursing feature, turtleneck and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Shirt in an airy, patterned Tencel™ lyocell and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shoes in brogue-patterned imitation patent leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Terry linings and insoles.

Ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, detachable belt with metal D-rings and a zip fly. Relaxed fit with side and back pockets, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.

Ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, detachable belt with metal D-rings and a zip fly. Relaxed fit with side and back pockets, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.

Ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist, detachable belt with metal D-rings and a zip fly. Relaxed fit with side and back pockets, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.

Top in soft cotton jersey and a dungaree dress in cotton corduroy. Top with a round neck and long sleeves with a small frill trim at the cuffs. Dress with adjustable straps, a frill-trimmed chest pocket, and buttons at the sides. Unlined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Metal chain necklace with metal and shell pendants. Adjustable length 39-47.5 cm.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted, knee-length dress in jersey with a small stand-up collar, short cap sleeves, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist with a close-fitting skirt. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt in a heavily draping fine knit with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.

5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fitted, short-sleeved body in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details, a lined hood, zip at the top and slits in the sides.
Boxy T-shirt in soft fabric with gently dropped shoulders.
Boxy T-shirt in soft fabric with gently dropped shoulders.
Boxy T-shirt in soft fabric with gently dropped shoulders.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia-knit front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia-knit front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia-knit front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton twill with embroidery on the front, an open chest pocket, adjustable straps with a button and buttons at the sides.
Short dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front and a seam at the waist with a wide, sewn-in tie belt.

Short, fitted dress in corduroy velour with a square neckline, wide shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with decorative buttons and two slits at the front. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave a deep V-neck with a tie-detail at the back. Open section with smocking at the back of the waist, 3/4 length trumpet sleeves and lace-trimmed flounces at the sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.

Straight-cut top in jersey crêpe with inset lace trims. Round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and short sleeves.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with decorative gathers at the back and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist.

Jacket in soft, fast-drying thermal fleece with a high collar, concealed zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Long-sleeved top in soft thermal fleece with a stand-up collar lined in woven fabric. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket in woven fabric, zipped front pockets, and taped trims at the cuffs and hem.
